Articles.Content:
I am using Kethane, City lights and clouds (deleted the lights), Universe Replacer - which are only the mods I would see to be (maybe in combination) possibly responsible for: Zooming out beyond the orbit of Minmus, all orbits disappear and I am left with the SOIs and vessel icons on the map - zooming back in brings them back, but interplanetary maneuvers are impossible to do.

Still have to try if it only happens after some time in the game.
